issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

projectCategory.description: Titanium and related SDKs used in application development
projectCategory.name: Client

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

components.name: TiAPI
components.description: This component is used for cross-platform API work. Specifications are most likely to use this component.

fields.description:
Where possible, we need to create tests to ensure the constant values off of the Ti.Media module obey the following:

- They are, in fact, constant (cannot be modified and/or even if modified, always return the same value)
- They align with "expected" values where these are known; note that this may not be possible due to the iOS SDK changing values of constants between releases.
fields.summary: Test values of platform-specific Ti.Media constants (Ti.Media unit tests)

comments.body: Closing ticket as we no longer support Drillbit.
